div.p: Updated the Post Message description in Chapter 4, API Operations to include the information that you must include even a single message in a JSON array or you will receive the error message "Invalid request body".

div.p: Updated release note for v1.0.12, October 18, 2011 ( v1.0.12, October 18, 2011 ) to reflect the following service level name changes:

li.p: The service level name for Core Cloud (Cloud) has been changed to Infrastructure Service Level.
The service level name for Managed Cloud (Managed) has been changed to Managed Cloud Service Level.

source.title: Rackspace Auto Scale Developer Guide API v1.0 revision history

li.p: Added the following tables describing request and response attributes:
Get Agent Details response (Section 3.1.1, “Get Agent Details” ).
Enable/Disable Agent request (Section 3.1.2, “Enable / Disable Agent” ).
Enable Volume Encryption request (Section 3.1.3, “Enable Volume Encryption”).
Delete Agent response (Section 3.1.4, “Delete Agent”).
Get All Agents for this User response (Section 3.2.1, “Get All Agents for this User”).
Create Backup Configuration request (Section 3.3.1, “Create Backup Configuration”).
Create Backup Configuration response (Section 3.3.1, “Create Backup Configuration”).
Update Backup Configuration request (Section 3.3.2, “Update Backup Configuration”).
Get Backup Configuration Details response (Section 3.4.2, “Get Backup Details”).
Get All Backup Configurations for User response (Section 3.3.4, “Get All Backup Configurations for User”).
Get All Backup Configurations for Agent response (Section 3.3.5, “Get All Backup Configurations for Agent”).
Enable/Disable a Backup Configuration request (Section 3.3.6, “Enable / Disable a Backup Configuration”).
Disable a Backup Configuration request (Section 3.3.6, “Enable / Disable a Backup Configuration”).
Disable a Backup Configuration response (Section 3.3.6, “Enable / Disable a Backup Configuration”).
Start a Backup Manually request and response (Section 3.4.1, “Start or Stop a Backup Manually”).
Stop a Backup Manually request (Section 3.4.1, “Start or Stop a Backup Manually”).
Get Backup Details response (Section 3.4.2, “Get Backup Details”).
Get Completed Backups response (Section 3.4.3, “Get Completed Backups”).
Create a Restore Configuration response (Section 3.5.1, “Create a Restore Configuration”).
Get Details about a Restore response (Section 3.6.3, “Get Details about a Restore”).
Update a Restore Configuration request (Section 3.5.2, “Update a Restore Configuration”).
Include/Exclude File in Restore Configuration request (Section 3.5.3, “Include / Exclude a File in Restore Configuration”).
List Included/Excluded Files in Restore Configuration request (Section 3.5.4, “List Included or Excluded Files in a Restore Configuration”).
Start Encrypted Restore request (Section 3.6.2, “Start or Stop a Restore Manually”).
Start Unencrypted Restore request (Section 3.6.2, “Start or Stop a Restore Manually”).
Stop Restore Manually request (Section 3.6.2, “Start or Stop a Restore Manually”).
Get Details about a Restore response (Section 3.6.3, “Get Details about a Restore”).
Get Restore Report response (Section 3.6.4, “Get Restore Report”).
List Activity for an Agent response (Section 3.7.1, “List Activity for an Agent”).
List Activity for User response (Section 3.7.2, “List Activity for User”).
Corrected examples in Section 3.6.2, “Start or Stop a Restore Manually”.

Updated information about the use of authentication endpoints in Section 2.1, “Authentication”. You can now use either the US endpoint or UK endpoint to access the Authentication Service, regardless of US or UK identities.
Removed the Date/Time section. The Cloud Backup API now supports only Microsoft Date Format and not ISO.
Added Sydney (SYD) data center to datacenter specifications.
Removed the Help Operations section that was at the end of the book as these are classified as internal calls.
Changed all occurrences of raxtestaddress@gmail.com to raxtestaddress@rackspace.com.
